video_prompt: Miniature boat glides across rippling turquoise water within a seashell. Starfish shift on a curving sandy beach. Glowing orbs pulsate their warm light, illuminating changing coral structures.
image_prompt: A large, creamy white conch shell, presented vertically against a dark gradient background (black to dark blue/grey). Inside the shell, a miniature beach scene unfolds: pristine white sand, clear turquoise water with ripples and highlights, scattered orange-brown starfish, and creamy white/light brown coral formations. Several glowing orange-yellow spherical lights illuminate the scene, casting a warm ambiance. A small, light brown wooden boat floats peacefully in the water. The overall impression is a serene, dreamlike, miniature marine world within a seashell.
refined_video_prompt: Water ripples as a boat glides across its surface. Starfish subtly shift their forms and locations on the sand. Orbs rhythmically pulsate, their light dynamically altering the visibility and color of the evolving coral structures.
